name.description: The name of the ad set.

end_time.description: The date and time when the ad set will end.

promoted_object.description: Information about the object being promoted in the ad set.

custom_event_type.description: The custom event type used for tracking purposes.

pixel_id.description: The Pixel ID associated with the ad set.

pixel_rule.description: The rule set for the Pixel.

page_id.description: The ID of the promoted Facebook page.

object_store_url.description: The URL of the promoted object in the store.

application_id.description: The ID of the promoted application.

product_set_id.description: The ID of the product set being promoted.

offer_id.description: The ID of the promoted offer.

id.description: The unique ID of the ad set.

account_id.description: The ID of the Facebook ad account to which the ad set belongs.

updated_time.description: The date and time when the ad set was last updated.

daily_budget.description: The daily budget set for the ad set.

budget_remaining.description: The remaining budget in the ad set.

effective_status.description: The effective status of the ad set (e.g., active, paused).

campaign_id.description: The ID of the campaign associated with the ad set.

created_time.description: The date and time when the ad set was created.

start_time.description: The date and time when the ad set will start.

lifetime_budget.description: The lifetime budget set for the ad set.

targeting.description: The targeting parameters set for the ad set.

bid_info.description: Information about bidding in the ad set.

CLICKS.description: Number of clicks on the ad set.

ACTIONS.description: Number of actions taken as a result of the ad set.

IMPRESSIONS.description: Number of times the ad set was displayed.

REACH.description: Number of unique users who saw the ad set.

bid_strategy.description: The bidding strategy used in the ad set.

bid_amount.description: The amount set for bidding in the ad set.

bid_constraints.description: Bid constraints for the ad set.

roas_average_floor.description: The minimum return on ad spend (ROAS) required for the ad set.

adlabels.description: Labels associated with the ad set.

created_time.description: The date and time when the label was created.

updated_time.description: The date and time when the label was last updated.
